gurmukhi: rcnw cirqR icqR ibsm bicqRpn eyk cItI ko cirqR khq n AwvhI
transliteration: Rachanaa Charitr Chitr Bisam Bachitrapana , Ayk Cheetee Ko Charitr Kahat N Aavahee ?
translation: The picture of miraculous creation of the Creator-God is full of wonder and awe. We cannot even describe the deeds of a small ant created by Him.

gurmukhi: pRQm hI cItI ky imlwp ko pRqwp dyKo shs Anyk eyk ibl mY smwvhI
transliteration: Pradam Hee Cheetee Kay Milaap Ko Prataap Daykho , Sahas Anayk Ayk Bil Mai Samaavahee ?
translation: Just see how thousands of ants get organised in a small burrow/hole.

gurmukhi: AgRBwgI pwCY eykY mwrg clq jwq pwvq imTws bwsu qhI imil DwveI
transliteration: Agrabhaagee Paachhai Aykai Maarag Chalat Jaata , Paavat Mitthaas Baasu Tahee Mili Dhaavaee ?
translation: All of them tread and walk on the same path that is defined by the leading ant. Wherever they smell sweetness, they all reach there.

gurmukhi: BiRMgI imil qwqkwl BiRMgI rUp huie idKwvY cItI cItI icqR AlK icqyrY kq pwvhI ]274]
transliteration: Bhringee Mili Taatakaal Bhringee Roop Hui Dikhaavai , Cheetee Cheetee Chitr Alakh Chitayrai Kat Paavahee ?274?
translation: Meeting an insect with wings, they adopt their life-style. When we are unable to know the wonders of a small ant, how can we know the super naturalness of the Creator who has created countless things in this universe? (274)
